section.title: Registering namespaces
section.name: reg_namespaces
section.paragraph: Namespaces are registered with the REG_NAMESPACE_TOP_LEVEL and REG_NAMESPACE macros.

Registered namespaces can be reflected with and used for example when registering other namespaces or types. The macros create a namespace alias for the new registered namespace. This alias can be used to refer to the namespace in subsequent expressions.

The alias has generally the form of _toplevel_nested_detail for a ::toplevel::nested::detail namespace. The predefined alias for the global scope namespace is _ (a single underscore). Besides this, several other namespaces, like ::std with the _std alias, or the ::boost namespace with the _boost alias, are registered by default.
